items.title: 'Huawei lobbyists' held in Belgium raids over EU corruption
items.description: The prosecutor's office said it raided 21 addresses in Belgium, according to local media.

items.title: Peace talks are in parallel universe, say Ukraine front-line troops
items.description: Ukrainian soldiers on the battlefield say they don't expect to see the war end any time soon.

items.title: Donatella steps down as Versace creative director
items.description: Versace is facing a creative shift as Prada looks to potentially buy the Italian fashion house.

items.title: Meta stops ex-director from promoting critical memoir
items.description: Social media company wins US emergency ruling preventing ex-director from publicising her book.

items.title: Southern African forces to leave DR Congo as rebels gain ground
items.description: At least 17 soldiers from Malawi and South Africa have been killed in DR Congo.
